title: 3D Printing-Based Project Learning Program for Strengthening Social Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental 3D modeling concepts and ability to analyze social issues
context.additional_context: Team project on 3D modeling and community problem-solving using smartphone apps (e.g., Thingiverse)

learning_goals: Learners can create two or more prototypes that solve community problems using 3D printing technology.
Learners achieve a formative assessment score of at least 80 points through project outcome evaluations.
Learners can explain all stages of the 3D modeling design process (planning-production-verification) through team-based collaboration.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
